misc: Primary organizer of the Hector Trophée event.
biography: Toni, a distinguished figure hailing from Hirsala Golf, stands as a cornerstone of the Hector Trophée. As the primary organizer of this esteemed event, Toni's dedication to the sport is evident both on and off the course.

A constant presence at the Hector Trophée, Toni has participated in all eleven editions of the tournament, showcasing a remarkable commitment to the event. Over the years, Toni has secured three Hector Trophée titles and has twice been awarded the Victor Trophy, solidifying a reputation as a formidable competitor.

Known for a strategic mind and an unwavering focus, Toni approaches each tournament with meticulous planning. Spectators and fellow players alike admire Toni's calm and collected demeanor under pressure. As Toni prepares for Hector Trophée 2025, marking a twelfth appearance, anticipation is high to witness the continued impact on the tournament.
